short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A tiny and simple proxy configurator.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This provides a very simple and minimal proxy configuration method. In addition to specifying the proxy host, you can specify the URL of the PAC script or the PAC script itself.
